questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Architecture and mural

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) On a building exterior
D) Inside a museum

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A mural on a building

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A group of people
B) A body of water
C) A mural with letters
D) A sculpture

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A person
B) A tree
C) The letters A to I
D) A vehicle

A) Red and green
B) Blue and yellow
C) Black and white
D) Orange and purple

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) A brick wall
C) A forest
D) A playground

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A crowd of people
B) A row of small bushes
C) A river
D) A bench

A) The mural is painted on the wall
B) The mural is a separate structure in front of the wall
C) The mural is hanging from the wall
D) The mural is projected onto the wall

What letters are highlighted in yellow?
A) A and B
B) C and D
C) E and F
D) H and I

B) Brick and textured

D) Glassy and reflective

D) To display a sign

A) 5
B) 7

B) Blue

D) Black

D) Red
